data.title: The Mother of Napoleon, Maria Letizia Ramolini, born in Corsica in 1750. Published by W. & R. Chambers, April 9, 1836, No. 219. 1836. by Chambers' Edinburgh Journal: Very Good Disbound (1836) First Ed
data.meta_description: First Edition. - Disbound - W. & R. Chambers, April 9, 1836, No. 219., Edinburgh - 1836 - Condition: Very Good - 8 pages as issued. Folio. (9.5 x 14 ins). FEATURING approx 400 line biographical sketch of Napoleon's mother. Occasional light spotting. A good copy of the original Weekly Newspaper. Posted folded. Size: Folio (23 x 33 cms). Multiple copies available this title. Quantity Available: 2. Category: Chambers' Edinburgh Journal; Inventory No: 359441. Cosmo Books : 27 years selling on ABE; 27 years of taking care of customers on ABE; A seller you can rely on. - The Mother of Napoleon, Maria Letizia Ramolini, born in Corsica in 1750. Published by W. & R. Chambers, April 9, 1836, No. 219. 1836.
data.text:
Shipping Terms:

THERE IS A POSTAGE REDUCTION FOR TWO OR MORE ITEMS IN AN ORDER. USE ADD TO BASKET TO SEE THE CHARGES BEFORE ORDERING.

Note our low cost high - speed shipping. Postage extra. All overseas orders sent by airmail only. DELIVERY SCHEDULE - We usually despatch within the two days following your order, ie a Friday order may not go out until Tuesday, and then you need to allow a little time for delivery. Typical delivery times - UK 3-5 working days. Europe 10- 15 working days. USA & Rest of World 15-30 working days.
